verses.1: Rehoboamʼ ukna kipin a thahat ciangin, amah a kipan amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh in Topaʼ thukham nusia uh hi.
verses.2: Topa tungah amaute citak lo uh ahih manin Rehoboamʼ kum ngana kumin Jerusalem a sim dingin Egypt kumpipa Shishak, leeng galkap tul le za nih le sakol tung tuang galkap tul sawm guk tawh hong kuan to hi. Egypt panin amah tawh a hong kuan mite pen Libya mi, Sukkiim mi le Ethiopia mite hi a, a tamna sim zawh hi lo hi.
verses.4: Amah in kulh nei khuapite la-in Jerusalem ciang dong hong tung hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin Shishakʼ huhau-in Jerusalem ah a kikhawm Rehoboam le Judah uliante kiangah kamsang Shemaiah hong pai-in amaute kiangah, “ Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Note in kei nong nusia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Shishakʼ khut sungah note kong pia khin hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin Judah uliante le kumpipa kiniamkhiatin, “ Topa thuman hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute a kiniamkhiatna thu Topa in a muh ciangin Shemaiahʼ tungah Topaʼ thu hong tung hi: “Amaute kiniamkhiat ahih manin ka susia kei ding hi. Amaute ka suaktasak liailiai tei dinga, Shishakʼ khut tawh Jerusalem tungah ka hehna a cingin ka tungsak kei ding hi.
verses.8: Ahi zongin amaute in keima nasepna le leitung kumpiteʼ nasepna a kilamdanna a theih nadingun amaute pen Shishakʼ nasemte suak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.9: Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem a simin Egypt kumpipa Shishak hong kuan to hi. Amah in Topaʼ biakinn-a van manphate le kumpipaʼ inn-a van manphate a kipan na khempeuh a la khia hi. Amah in Solomonʼ bawl sa kham lumte zong la khia hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in tuateʼ tangin sumngo lum bawl a, kumpipaʼ kongcing ahi inncing a ukteʼ khut sungah tuate a ap hi.
verses.11: Topaʼ biakinn ah kumpipa a pai simin a cingte hong pai-in tuate keng uh a, tua ciangin cinna inn dei sungah tuate koihkik uh hi.
verses.12: Amah a kiniamkhiat ciangin siat cimitna a pian loh nadingin ama tung pan Topaʼ hehna kihei khia hi. Tua tham loin Judah gam sungah thu paizia zong hong hoihsak hi.
verses.13: Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam a mahmah Jerusalem ah kikipsakin a uk hi. Rehoboam in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm nih le khat pha a, Israel minam khempeuh sung panin a min koih nadingin Topa in a teelkhiat khuapi Jerusalem ah amah in kum sawm le kum sagih sung a uk hi. Ama nuʼ min Naamah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi.
verses.14: Amah in Topa zon ding a lungsimah koih lo ahih manin a sia a gamta hi.
verses.15: Tu-in Rehoboamʼ gamtatnate, a kipatna pan a tawpna dong, Kamsang Shemaiah le Thumu pa Iddoʼ Khang Tangthu sungah kigelh hi. Rehoboam le Jeroboam kikalah gal kidona om tawntung hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin Rehoboam si a, Davidʼ khuapi sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Abijah in ama tangin a uk hi.
